Today, we gathered in Deadwood to pay our final respects to Chuck Turbiville, a dedicated father, grandfather, public servant and friend. All South Dakotans are grateful for his service to our state and nation. Keeping his family in our thoughts and prayers.

Jean and I are deeply saddened to hear of the passing of our good friend, Justice Steve Zinter. He was a true public servant who dedicated his life to upholding the rule of law and a fair judicial process. We keep his family in our thoughts and prayers during this difficult time.
